
## CS760
## Flight Delay Prediction
## Air Carrier Prediction


```{r}
rm(list = ls())
gc(reset=TRUE)
```

```{r}
data2013 = read.csv("2013.csv")
head(data2013)
```




```{r}
dim(data2013)
sort(table(data2013$DEST))
table(data2013$CANCELLATION_CODE)
```

## Only use airport ATL data
```{r}
atl2013_origin = data2013[data2013$ORIGIN=='ATL',]
atl2013_dest = data2013[data2013$DEST=='ATL',]

```

```{r}
atl2013 = atl2013_dest
dim(atl2013)
head(atl2013)
```



```{r}
rm(data2013)
gc(reset=TRUE)
```

```{r}
sum(is.na(atl2013$ARR_DELAY))
atl2013 = atl2013[!is.na(atl2013$ARR_DELAY),]
```

## Date
```{r}
atl2013$flight_date = as.Date(atl2013$FL_DATE,"%Y-%m-%d")
head(atl2013)
```

## month
```{r}
library(lubridate)
atl2013$month = factor(month(atl2013$flight_date))
head(atl2013$month)
```

## wday
```{r}
atl2013$wday = factor(wday(atl2013$flight_date))
head(atl2013$wday)
```


## Hour
```{r}
library(tidyverse)

atl2013 = atl2013 %>% arrange(flight_date, CRS_DEP_TIME)

atl2013$plan_dep_hour = floor(atl2013$CRS_DEP_TIME/100)
atl2013$plan_dep_previous_hour = atl2013$plan_dep_hour-1
head(atl2013, 100)
```





## Carrier NA Handle
```{r}
atl2013[is.na(atl2013$CARRIER_DELAY),]$CARRIER_DELAY=0
head(atl2013)
```



## Hourly average delay
```{r}
dayHourAirlineMeanDelay = aggregate(atl2013$NAS_DELAY, list(atl2013$FL_DATE, atl2013$plan_dep_hour, atl2013$OP_CARRIER), mean)
head(dayHourAirlineMeanDelay)


colnames(dayHourAirlineMeanDelay)=c("FL_DATE", "plan_dep_previous_hour", "OP_CARRIER", "previous_hour_avg_delay")
dayHourAirlineMeanDelay = dayHourAirlineMeanDelay%>%arrange(FL_DATE,plan_dep_previous_hour)
head(dayHourAirlineMeanDelay)

```

## previous hour average delay
```{r}
atl2013 = merge(atl2013, dayHourAirlineMeanDelay, by=c("FL_DATE", "plan_dep_previous_hour", "OP_CARRIER"), all.x=TRUE)

head(atl2013, 100)


```

```{r}
atl2013[is.na(atl2013$previous_hour_avg_delay),]$previous_hour_avg_delay=0
head(atl2013)
```

```{r}
atl2013$CARRIER_DELAY_BOOL=!is.na(atl2013$CARRIER_DELAY) & atl2013$CARRIER_DELAY>15
table(atl2013$CARRIER_DELAY_BOOL)
```

## over-sampling
```{r}
CARRIER_DELAY_TRUE = sample_n(atl2013[atl2013$CARRIER_DELAY_BOOL==TRUE,], sum(atl2013$CARRIER_DELAY_BOOL==FALSE), replace = TRUE)
CARRIER_DELAY_FALSE = atl2013[atl2013$CARRIER_DELAY_BOOL==FALSE,]

atl2013_CARRIER = rbind(CARRIER_DELAY_TRUE, CARRIER_DELAY_FALSE)
dim(atl2013_CARRIER)
table(atl2013_CARRIER$CARRIER_DELAY_BOOL)
```

## predict by simple variable
```{r}
fit <- glm(CARRIER_DELAY_BOOL~previous_hour_avg_delay, family="binomial", atl2013_CARRIER)
summary(fit)
pred <- predict(fit, atl2013_CARRIER, type="response")

pred_result = pred>0.5
head(pred_result)

table(atl2013_CARRIER$CARRIER_DELAY_BOOL, pred_result)
```

```{r}
sum(is.na(pred_result))
sum(pred_result==atl2013_CARRIER$CARRIER_DELAY_BOOL)/length(pred_result)
```

## predict by all variables
```{r}




fit_CARRIER <- glm(CARRIER_DELAY_BOOL~previous_hour_avg_delay+OP_CARRIER+CRS_DEP_TIME+CRS_ARR_TIME+DISTANCE+month+wday, family="binomial", atl2013_CARRIER)
```


```{r}
pred <- predict(fit_CARRIER, atl2013_CARRIER, type="response")

pred_result = pred>0.5
head(pred_result)

table(atl2013_CARRIER$CARRIER_DELAY_BOOL, pred_result)
sum(pred_result==atl2013_CARRIER$CARRIER_DELAY_BOOL)/length(pred_result)
```
